text: Kaiali ªi Kahele (born March 28, 1974) is an American politician, educator, and commercial pilot. He was a member of the United States House of Representatives from Hawaii from 2021 to 2023. He was a member of the Hawaii Senate from the 1st district. Kahele is a member of the Democratic Party. In 2022, he unsuccessfully ran for Governor of Hawaii, losing to Lieutenant Governor Josh Green. ==References== Category:1974 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from Hawaii Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Educators from Hawaii
title: Kai Kahele
